TLBEntry Class Reference

Defines an entry in the TLB. More...

#include <tlb.h>

Public Attributes

short int virtualPage

Detailed Description

Defines an entry in the TLB.

Member Data Documentation

short int TLBEntry::physicalPage
 

The page number in real memory (relative to the start of "mainMemory")

bool TLBEntry::readOnly
 

If this bit is set, the user program is not allowed to modify the contents of the page.

bool TLBEntry::valid
 

If this bit isn't set, the translation is ignored. (In other words, the entry hasn't been initialized.)

short int TLBEntry::virtualPage
 

The page number in virtual memory.
